entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
